meaningMnemonic: <radical>Stop</radical>! That <radical>box</radical> of <radical>rice</radical> is actually full of <kanji>teeth</kanji>! I know it says "rice" on the cover, but I promise you those are all teeth and if you bite into them you'll break a <kanji>tooth</kanji> of your own.
readingMnemonic: Why do I have a rice box full of <kanji>teeth</kanji>? <reading>Ha</reading> (は)! Wouldn't you like to know. Ha! I definitely have an answer that isn't weird or creepy. Ha... ha ha...
